page.title: 02Hampton Green Farm
page.content: This farm is a tiny portion of the {Hampton Court Estate}which straddles the Dinmore Ridge.{2 herds}of cattle are run on the estate.{(1)The famous {Hampton Court Horned Herefords,(2) A {milking herd of Friesian/Holsteen}The main enterprise is the development of {cattle breeding technology.}The{new {science _ EMBRYO TRANSFER.}The Estate runs a unit designed to develop E.T. for use in developing countries. This can in one generation provide all the milk and meat needs a country may require.The Estate has been developing this research for the last 5 years and all the cattle on the estate are the result of selective E.T.work.The main {advantages of E.T.are:- {(1)Cost of transportation is minimal. {(2)Mothers immunity given to offspring {(3)Genetic improvements now take 9 { months,not generations as with A.I.
